settings.moon_phase_discripiton: The Waxing Gibbous is the last phase before the Moon reaches maximum illumination. It appears close to full, but is not completely illuminated. Kind, caring and nurturing are characteristics of those born under this moon, making them amazing mentors. Relationships under this moon are very intense as emotions are amplified which create incredibly strong bonds. This is a time of communication, a time to share personal stories and love between friends and family members.

settings.heading_title: Celebs Who Love Us to the Moon and Back

settings.title: Life's Moments Are To Be Cherished
settings.text: Julien Plouffe and Aurelie Dudziak both believe that being alive on earth is a gift meant to be celebrated. And that being reminded of the most memorable moments in life we share, gives us a unique opportunity to connect more deeply with one another. With Moonglow, every moment has a moon, giving us the opportunity to share our lives and dreams with those we love.

settings.caption_heading: Over 250,000 people over the moon about their jewelry
settings.caption_title:
My daughter requested a moon phase bracelet as a gift. I used her January wedding date and chose the April birthstone because I thought the gemstone would be perfect. And the bracelet is perfect! It’s absolutely gorgeous! I can’t wait to give it to her!

Holly S.

Verified buyer

settings.title: The Original
settings.text: Always look for the Moonglow authentication sigil on the back of every pendant. This seal confirms the authenticity of your original Moonglow piece and is the signature seal of Canadian artist Luc, the designer of our iconic moon image.

settings.title: Swarovski Crystals
settings.text: Our unique birthstone jewelry is crafted with authentic Swarovski Crystals, available in the twelve colors symbollic of your birth month. The beaded bracelet collections are also crafted with genuine gemstones, offering unique crystal properties in every stone.

settings.title: Custom Jewelry
settings.text: Enjoy the beauty and convenience of your customized Moonglow experience. We’re proud to offer unparalleled customer service and fast, free shipping on all orders over $50. Simply select your special date, find your moon, and enter your customized engraving.

The Moonglow team takes their New York entrepreneurial spirit on the road to Miami, Florida and launches moonglow.com
Moonglow opens it's first authorized retailer.

settings.title: Many Moons Ago...
settings.text: Julien Plouffe and Aurelie Dudziak both believed that being alive on earth is a gift meant to be celebrated. And that by being reminded of the most memorable moments in life we share, gives us a unique opportunity to connect more deeply with one other. With Moonglow, every moment has a moon and gives us an opportunity to share our lives and dreams with those we love.

settings.title: Cherish your most precious moment in your favorite piece of jewelry.
Many Moons Ago... It started with a vision
settings.text: Julien Plouffe and Aurelie Dudziak both believed that being alive on earth is a gift meant to be celebrated. And that by being reminded of the most memorable moments in life we share, gives us a unique opportunity to connect more deeply with one other. With Moonglow, every moment has a moon and gives us an opportunity to share our lives and dreams with those we love.

settings.title: 250,000 people over the moon
settings.text: 15,000+ Five star reviews

settings.title: Want to Find Your Moon?
settings.text: Discover the moon from your special date using our moon calculator.

settings.title: Select the moon from the date of your choice
what is moonglow?
settings.desc: Moonglow is jewelry that features the picture of the moon from the date of your chopice. Pick any date you want to commemorate - the birth of a child, an anniversary, a graduation- and find the exact moon phase through our moon phase calculator. Once you have chosen your date, choose from our collection of bracelets, necklaces and more to carry your detailed hi-resolution image. As an added bonus, your moon will gently glow in the dark, reminding you of that special moment.

settings.title: WHAT ARE YOUR SHIPPING AND RETURN POLICIES?
settings.desc:
Please visit the following link for shipping and return information http://www.moonglow.com/shipping-returns

Certain items must be constructed on a per order basis. If the item needs to be handcrafted, there will be a message in the product description saying: This one-of-a-kind gem takes 14 days to construct.

settings.title: The Moonglow Jewelry Retailer Program
settings.text: Moonglow Jewelry is custom-made and personalized, representing a significant moment in one’s life. Customers choose a date of significance such as a birthday, anniversary, engagement or wedding day, Moonglow then provides the phase of the moon on that exact date and crafts a framed image of that phase. Each Moonglow pendant absorbs light during the day and glows at night, serving as a constant reminder of the special moment it represents.

settings.title: Meet Tara
settings.text:
Have Question?

Tara@moonglow.com

Every time we sell a piece, that customer brings a friend or family member back because they "Need" one too!

Kathleen

Silver Moon Gallery

Moonglow is a great line that moves well! Everybody loves looking up their special dates.

Victoria

Gift Gallery of Vienna

Moonglow has been our best seller for two years now. The interaction, design and price point of this product makes it a great line to carry.

Christina

Sedona's Tree House

settings.title: The Moon Phase Guide
settings.text: Our Moon Phase Guide makes it fun, interactive, and simple for your customers to look up a date, find their moon, and make their Moonglow purchase.

settings.title: Want to Find Your Moon?
settings.text: Discover the moon from your special date using our moon calculator.

settings.title: What are the Moonglow retailer qualifications?
settings.text: You must have a brick and mortar store or a reputable online store. We do not sell or permit selling on Amazon or other third party websites. A minimum purchase is required.

settings.title: what does a moonglow retailer do?
settings.text: Our Retail Partners are committed to appropriately stocking styles carried in store and following branding guidelines to present Moonglow Jewelry. Educational and marketing tools are provided to Retail Partners. Moonglow is incredibly unique, meaningful and affordable, a consistent seller in stores.

settings.title: what kind of products does moonglow offer?
settings.text: Moonglow has spent the last ten years conceptualizing and delivering this unique, sentimental jewelry to a global audience. With Moonglow’s ever-expanding selection, we constantly strive to offer pieces that are universally appealing. We offer a variety of pieces including necklaces, pendants, bracelets and rings. Each piece has its own moon-related title and description, giving it a personality of its own.

settings.title: where is moonglow jewelry made?
settings.text: One of the biggest selling points is that Moonglow Jewelry is hand finished in North America. Moonglow’s distribution hub is located in, and product ships from, Miami, Florid

settings.title: How it works
settings.desc_1: Join the Moonglow VIP program and start earning.
settings.desc_2: Earn moon points every time you shop.

settings.list_1:
• 1x moon point multiplier
    (1 point earned per $1 spent)

  • Birthday Bonus (100 moon points)

  • Free shipping when you spend over $50
settings.list_2:
• 1.5x moon point multiplier
    (1.5 point earned per $1 spent)

  • Free Shipping

  • Birthday Bonus (150 moon points)

  • Free Lip Balm with every order

  • Entry Gift: 10% off Your Next Purchase when entering the tier

settings.title: Redeem for Discounts
settings.text: Redeeming your hard-earned moon points is easy! Simply apply your moon points balance at checkout.

settings.title: Ways to Earn Moon Points
settings.sub_title: Every 10 moon points earned = $1 in store credit
settings.title_2: Refer Friends and Earn Moon Points

settings.title: Moonglow VIP
settings.text: As a Moonglow VIP Member, you'll get access to exclusive perks and get closer to rewards every time you shop.

settings.title: Unique Jewelry for Special Moments.
settings.text: Moonglow is handcrafted in Canada and our iconic moon image is an original design by Canadian artist Luc, carefully set in each unique piece. We cherish each Moonglow piece as much as you cherish your special moment.
